suppress.notes: CVE-2016-7051 is only relevant to jackson-dataformat-xml according to NVD [1] and original bug report [2]. [1] https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-dataformat-xml/issues/211 Reported for : jackson-annotations-2.8.0.jar and jackson-core-2.8.6.jar.
